translation.en: ♪ I see no need to take me home ♪
Did they say if they have kids?
translation.zh: 他们说没说过自己有孩子？

translation.en: [woman] I didn't ask.
Shit!
[woman] Will, what is this?
translation.zh: 威尔 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Ehh, it's probably a rat.
Whatever it is, it's long gone.
translation.zh: 不管是什么东西弄的 它都早不在了

translation.en: The pool's a fucking mess. Looks like a swamp.
translation.zh:
泳池他妈的一团糟
看起来像个沼泽一样

translation.en: -Stop. -What's wrong?
You know, you used to love to fool around in the nice ones.
translation.zh:
你以前很喜欢
在漂亮的房子里啪啪啪的啊

translation.en: Is this one above my pay grade?
[woman] I'm in the middle of a dark tunnel, and my car dies on me.
translation.zh:
我身处在一条漆黑的隧道中央
我的车子坏了

translation.en: So, I'm sitting there alone and looking for a flashlight,
translation.zh: 于是我便独自坐在那里找手电筒

translation.en: but then I hear a train coming towards me, but I can't see it.
translation.zh:
可然后我听见
有一列火车朝我驶来 但我看不见它

translation.en: So, I started feeling for the keys to turn the battery on and flash the lights,
translation.zh:
于是我便开始摸索车钥匙
想让车子通电并闪灯

translation.en: but they were gone.
And I could hear the train speeding towards me,
translation.zh: 我能听见火车向我疾驰而来

translation.en: and I went to get out, but I couldn't.
translation.zh: 我想下车 可我下不了

translation.en: -I couldn't move. I just froze. -And then what?
translation.zh:
-我无法动弹 我整个人僵住了
-然后呢？

translation.en: [woman] That's it. What do you think it means?
translation.zh: 没有然后了 你认为这意味着什么？

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe you're afraid of getting caught.
[woman] Hi. This is Summer Elswick of Grady Real--
translation.zh: 你好 我是格雷迪房地产公司的萨默…

translation.en: [Will] What's the secret to survival?
And how did we survive when so many others didn't?
translation.zh:
为什么我们存活了下来
而很多人却没有？

translation.en: -Mm-hm? -I'll tell you the secret.
translation.zh: 我会告诉你们这其中的秘诀

translation.en: But first, I'm going to need you to do something for me.
translation.zh: 但首先 我要你们为我做一件事

translation.en: -I hate the beard. -Of course you do.
translation.zh:
-我不喜欢你这胡子
-你当然不喜欢

translation.en: It just doesn't look good.
I need you to take everything you know about your business,
translation.zh: 我要你们把自己对生意所了解的一切

translation.en: set it aside.
Good. Again.
[Will on loudspeaker] Advertising?
Set it aside.
We say to ourselves, when it takes six months to find a buyer,
translation.zh:
当我们花了六个月
才找到一个买家时 我们会对自己说

translation.en: "Oh, well, it must have been a marketing problem,"
but it is not a marketing problem.
translation.zh: 但这并不是市场营销的问题

translation.en: The problem
is us.
As a matter of fact,
there's a lot of… [whispers] …assholes in this business.
And the good news is that that is good news for you.
translation.zh:
而好消息是
这点对你们来说是个好消息

translation.en: [gray-haired woman] I never wanted to be the one to show places.
translation.zh: 我从来都不想带客户去看房子

translation.en: Made me too nervous.
So Bill, Will's father, God rest his soul, uh, insisted.
translation.zh:
可威尔的爸爸比尔
愿他安息 他坚持让我去

translation.en: He says, "Camille, you've got to." Remember that, honey? Thank you, dear.
translation.zh:
他说：“卡蜜儿 你一定得去”
你记得不 宝贝？谢谢 宝贝

translation.en: Uh, so anyway, there was this fellow standing outside…
translation.zh: 啊 说回来 有次有个人站在外面…

translation.en: [Will] Where the fuck were you?
I'm sorry. I fell asleep.
[Will sighs] You know how much this meant to me.
translation.zh: 你知道那演讲对我来说有多重要

translation.en: And where were you?
You fell asleep?
Hello? This is Summer.
-Okay, listen, I gotta go. -[doorbell jingles]
translation.zh: 好 听着 我得挂了

translation.en: -[man] Making moves. -Hey, man.
Sorry. It was a crazy day.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这一天事太多了

translation.en: [man] These foreclosures are a steal.
translation.zh: 这些止赎简直是白菜价

translation.en: -You're smart to move on it. -Everybody wants a piece.
translation.zh:
-你拿下这些是明智之举
-谁都想分一杯羹啊

translation.en: [automated voice] Back door open.
Hey! I'm in the kitchen.
-Do you mind if we make a stop? -[man] Do your thing.
translation.zh:
-你不介意我顺路去个地方吧？
-请便

translation.en: -[voicemail recording] Hi, this is Summer… -[call ends]
translation.zh: 你好 我是格雷迪房…

translation.en: This'll only be a second.
All good.
-[automated voice] Front door open. -[music fades]
Hello?
Hello?
Summer?
Are you retiring to France?
translation.zh: 你是要去法国安享晚年吗？

translation.en: Look, don't look at me. Tommy picked this place.
translation.zh: 听着 别看着我 这地方是汤米选的

translation.en: [man 1] She loves everything French.
-French dressing, French… -[woman] Men.
[man 1] French men, French kissing…
-Look who decided to show up. -[man 1] How's my favorite niece?
translation.zh:
-看看谁终于来了
-我最爱的侄女 你好吗？

translation.en: Hey.
-Fashionably late. -No, Wally, we started late.
translation.zh:
-你们故意来迟
-不 沃利 我们出门晚了

translation.en: -[man 1] What happened? -[man 2] Cut myself.
translation.zh: 出了什么事吗？ 我割伤了自己 在厨房不小心割到的

translation.en: Kitchen accident.
translation.zh: 我割伤了自己 在厨房不小心割到的

translation.en: -Six stitches, right there. -Bullshit. Judy stabbed him.
translation.zh:
-缝了六针 就是这里
-胡说 肯定是被朱蒂捅的

translation.en: [whispers] You deserved it.
-[man 1] Look at them. -Young love.
[man 1] Hey, they're calling. You guys drinking, come on.
translation.zh:
-嘿 他们叫我们过去了
-你们还喝什么啊？快来

translation.en: -[woman] …traveling for two weeks. -See anything you like, Vic?
translation.zh:
-…旅行两周
-有看到什么喜欢的吗 维克？

translation.en: -I can't fucking read this. -I got you, baby.
I'm gonna have the escargot…
Hey, Wally. I knew Oklahoma could boot scoot,
translation.zh:
嘿 沃利 我知道俄克拉荷马会跳排舞
但我不知道原来他会说法语啊

translation.en: but I didn't know he could speak French. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
我知道俄克拉荷马会跳排舞
但我不知道原来他会说法语啊

translation.en: Judy, here we go. Malta, Croatia.
translation.zh:
朱蒂 你看
我们会去马耳他、克罗地亚

translation.en: -Oh yes. -[woman] We end in Scarborough Castle…
translation.zh:
-噢 真不错
-最后我们会去斯卡伯勒城堡…

translation.en: -I'll take the spaghetti, please. -No, give him the duck.
translation.zh:
-麻烦给我来一份意大利面
-不 给他来一份鸭肉

translation.en: -[man 3] I'll take the duck. -Good boy.
-[woman] It's supposed to be haunted. -[Judy] Are you afraid?
-[woman] No, I'm excited. -Now, look at Allen's face.
translation.zh:
-不 我很兴奋
-大家看艾伦的脸色

translation.en: That's the face of a man who's about to spend more money on one dinner for four guys he doesn't even like,
translation.zh:
一个男人要花钱
请四个他根本不喜欢的男人吃饭

translation.en: than he has on Deena, his kids, birthdays, Christmas, vacations…
translation.zh:
而且这一顿的钱要比他在蒂娜、孩子 生日、圣诞和度假上花的还多
他就会有这脸色

translation.en: -Did I miss anything else? -[man 3] No, you got everything.
translation.zh:
-我没说漏什么吧？
-没有 你都说到了

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrates] -[Allen] Excuse me. Gotta get this. Excuse me.
translation.zh:
-不好意思 我得接这个电话
-不好意思？

translation.en: That's the bank!
-Tell 'em the Jesse James story. -Come on, you do it better than I do.
translation.zh:
-给他们讲讲杰西詹姆斯的故事吧
-拜托 你讲得比我好

translation.en: Tell 'em! Tell 'em.
Once upon a time, Jesse James and his gang robbed a train.
translation.zh:
很久以前 杰西詹姆斯
和他的手下抢劫了一列火车

translation.en: And he held everyone at gunpoint.
He says, "All right, give us all your money or we kill the women and rape all the men."
translation.zh:
“好了 交出你们所有的钱
不然我们就杀掉女人 强奸所有男人”

translation.en: One of the guys with his hands up says, "I'm sorry, don't you mean
translation.zh:
其中一个人举着手说 “对不起 你是不是想说
杀掉男人 强奸所有女人？”

translation.en: kill the men and rape all the women?"
translation.zh:
“对不起 你是不是想说
杀掉男人 强奸所有女人？”

translation.en: And then a gay guy in the back says,
translation.zh: 然后一个在后面的男同性恋就说

translation.en: "Excuse me, I think Mr. James knows how to rob a train."
translation.zh:
“不好意思 我想詹姆斯先生
应该知道怎么抢劫火车”

translation.en: -[Deena] More wine? Anyone? Anyone? -[Wally] We need more.
translation.zh:
-要吗？有谁想要吗？
-我们还要一点

translation.en: Tell us about this trip.
translation.zh: 跟我们讲讲你们旅游的事吧

translation.en: -[Deena] It's two weeks. -[tense music playing]
[Deena] We end up at this castle in Scarborough, England.
translation.zh:
最后一站我们会去英国的一座城堡
位于英国的斯卡伯勒

translation.en: It's supposed to be haunted. We stay there for three nights.
translation.zh: 据说那里闹鬼 我们会在那里住三晚

translation.en: -[Wally] He's not gonna like that. -[laughter]
[Deena] He doesn't know it's supposed to be haunted.
translation.zh: 沃利 他不知道那里闹鬼

translation.en: [female radio dispatcher] Standby 7-2, West 21st Street, #3.
Can you keep a secret?
Sure.
I'm sick.
[man 2] What do you mean?
I got MS.
I just found out last week.
Don't worry, I'm not gonna die on you.
translation.zh: 别担心 我不会死在你面前的

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
Get those people across the street. And no press.
I don't want anyone talking to them. Cleary, what do we got?
translation.zh:
不准媒体的人采访
谁都不许跟他们说话 -克利里 什么情况？
-死了一个房产经纪人

translation.en: We got a dead realtor.
translation.zh:
-克利里 什么情况？
-死了一个房产经纪人

translation.en: -You already pull the case number? -[Cleary] Yeah. 19H-012.
[Allen] …and the eaves above the attic.
Lot of nooks and crannies in a place like this. You've been all over, right?
translation.zh:
这种房子会有很多不起眼的犄角旮旯
你到处都去看过了 对吗？

translation.en: Is there any back staircase? That kind of stuff?
translation.zh: 有没有后楼梯或者类似的东西？

translation.en: Uh-huh? Look in the basement? What's in the basement?
translation.zh:
去地下室看过了吗？
地下室里有什么？

translation.en: Look in the backyard. There's sheds and things out there.
translation.zh: 去后院看看 那里有几间棚屋什么的

translation.en: I need you to look very carefully in those kind of places.
translation.zh:
我要你在那些地方里面
仔细地检查 知道吗？

translation.en: So the killer forgot something.
translation.zh: 凶手有东西忘了带走啊

translation.en: She was stabbed so hard it got jammed in her pelvis.
translation.zh:
她被捅得很用力
刀都卡在她的骨盆里了

translation.en: That's mine.
What's your name, man?
[male officer] Um, Joe.
Joe, when you walk through that door,
translation.zh: 乔 当你走过那扇门

translation.en: there's a jury of 12 watching you. You understand?
translation.zh: 会有12名陪审员看着你 你明白吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
[woman] I heard a car pull up.
translation.zh: 我听到有一辆车停了下来

translation.en: And I looked up and saw a man walking towards the front door.
translation.zh:
我抬头一看
看见一个男人正朝前门走去

translation.en: Hang on, Brenda. Where were you?
translation.zh: 等等 布兰达 你当时在哪儿？

translation.en: I was in that house right there.
translation.zh: 我在那边的那栋房子里

translation.en: I was outside smoking a cigarette.
Do you live there?
No, I'm the caregiver there.
translation.zh: 不 我在那里当护工

translation.en: [male detective] So you hear the car pull up,
translation.zh: 所以你听到有车停了下来

translation.en: you look this way,
then what happened?
I saw a man walk into the house.
translation.zh: 我看见一个男人走进了房子

translation.en: -[man] Just do your job! -You ever seen that man before?
translation.zh:
-忙你自己的去吧！
-你之前见过那个男人吗？

translation.en: -[officer] Settle down. -[Brenda] No.
-About how old do you think he was? -[Brenda] I don't know.
translation.zh:
-你觉得他多大年纪？
-我不知道

translation.en: -What'd he look like? -[Brenda] I couldn't tell. He was wearing a hoodie.
translation.zh:
-他长什么样？
-我看不出来 他穿着一件连帽衫

translation.en: I'll tell you what though. He walked sort of funny.
translation.zh:
不过我跟你们说
他走路的样子有点滑稽

translation.en: -What do you mean? -[Brenda] Like he had a limp.
translation.zh: 什么意思？ 他像瘸了一样

translation.en: Hi, Will.
Tom. Scarborough Homicide.
translation.zh:
我叫汤姆
我是斯卡伯勒警局凶杀调查科的人

translation.en: Everything is being recorded.
translation.zh: 这里的一切都会被录下来

translation.en: Before we start, I wanna say that I'm very sorry about what happened, Will.
translation.zh:
在开始之前 我想说
我很遗憾发生了这样的事 威尔

translation.en: How long were you and Summer together?
translation.zh: 你和萨默在一起多久了？

translation.en: About a year and a half.
How would you describe your relationship?
translation.zh: 你如何形容你们的关系？

translation.en: Normal.
Ups and downs.
Like any relationship, I guess.
translation.zh: 就跟所有情侣的关系一样吧

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?
translation.zh: 你最后一次见她是什么时候？

translation.en: Uh, I saw her this morning.
Did you notice anything strange about her?
translation.zh: 你有注意到她有什么奇怪的地方吗？

translation.en: No.
Well, we… had an argument last night.
translation.zh: 那个 我们昨晚吵了一架

translation.en: What about?
Doesn't even matter now. I had this thing.
translation.zh:
现在看回来
那根本不重要 我有一场演讲

translation.en: Um, she never showed up.
Do you know who she was meeting at the house?
translation.zh:
你知道
她打算和谁在那栋房子里见面吗？

translation.en: [Will hesitates] I don't know.
I don't know their name. She…
translation.zh: 我不知道那人的名字 她

translation.en: She never told me.
I was going to marry her. I told my mom.
translation.zh: 我本来想娶她的 我跟我妈说了

translation.en: The day I met her.
[inhales sharply] I said… I said, "I'm going to marry her."
Why didn't you?
Well, she's technically still married.
translation.zh: 严格来说 她还是已婚状态

translation.en: I know that sounds weird, but they were separated.
translation.zh:
我知道这听着很奇怪
但她跟她丈夫分居了

translation.en: What's her husband's name?
Sam Gifford.
Will, would you be willing to take a polygraph down the road?
translation.zh: 威尔 你愿意稍后接受测谎吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Good.
[officer] Open.
Lift your arm.
[Tom] What about the poly?
[Allen] Good luck with that.
Come on, I just want to hook him up to it, see what he says.
translation.zh:
拜托 我只是想给他接上测谎仪
看看他会说什么

translation.en: -You don't even have to plug it in. -You guys did that in Philly?
translation.zh:
-你甚至都不用插上电源
-你们在费城是那样干的？

translation.en: From time to time, yeah. Not against the law.
translation.zh: 对 我们时不时那样干 那又不违法

translation.en: He's got no scratches, nothing under his nails, no signs of struggle.
translation.zh:
他身上没有抓痕 指甲缝里也没东西
没有打斗过的痕迹

translation.en: Tom, let him go home. He's cooperating with us.
translation.zh: 汤姆 让他回家吧 他一直挺配合的

translation.en: All we got is a grandmother in Milwaukee we're trying to get ahold of.
translation.zh:
我们只查到她有个奶奶在密尔沃基
我们在尝试联系她

translation.en: Did we find her phone yet?
[Cleary] No, but we got a ping order. We've been calling. Nothing.
translation.zh:
没有 但我们拿到了定位授权令
我们一直在呼叫 但都打不通

translation.en: Okay.
Hi.
What happened?
They fucked up.
[Tom] I see.
-Hi, Peter. -[Peter] Hey, Tom.
Uh, our bad. [chuckles]
We made a mistake, but, uh, don't worry. It's going to come out of our end.
translation.zh:
我们出了点差错 但是别担心
这部分的费用由我们来出

translation.en: We'll, uh, get it fixed.
[man] You think Nichols should be our lead? [Allen] Yeah. Why?
translation.zh:
-这案子应该让尼克尔斯来领导吗？
-应该啊 为什么这么问？

translation.en: His past may bring the wrong kind of attention.
translation.zh: 他的过去可能会引起不必要的关注

translation.en: He doesn't have a past. He's clean.
translation.zh: 他没有什么过去 他是清白的

translation.en: If anything, he's got more experience handling homicide
translation.zh:
要说他有什么的话
那就是他有着比我们科任何人

translation.en: than anyone in our department.
translation.zh: 都丰富的侦办凶杀案经验

translation.en: Okay.
Good morning.
I'm Chief Marty Graeber. This is Captain Robert Allen.
translation.zh:
我是马蒂格雷柏局长
这位是罗伯特艾伦警监

translation.en: We're here to talk about the murder that occurred last evening.
translation.zh:
我们想向大家通报一下
昨晚发生的那起凶杀案的情况

translation.en: I do want to remind you all this is an ongoing investigation,
translation.zh:
我想提醒大家一句
因为这个案子还在调查当中

translation.en: so there's not going to be a lot of we can talk about,
translation.zh: 所以我们可以透露的情况不是很多

translation.en: but we'll do the best we can.
But I do want to emphasize that
our detectives have been working through the night.
translation.zh: 我们的警探们昨晚在通宵工作

translation.en: They will not rest until we find out who did this.
translation.zh: 在我们找出凶手前 他们都不会休息

translation.en: I want to make that very clear.
translation.zh: 这是我想说清楚的一点

translation.en: [Marty] Our men and women are some of the best in law enforcement anywhere in the country.
translation.zh:
我们的办案人员
在全国的执法部门中都是数一数二的

translation.en: -So with that… -[whispers] I just wanna air it out.
I love you.
[male voice] Heard of knives getting stuck before. First time I've ever seen it.
translation.zh:
我之前听说过刀被骨头卡住的情况
这是我第一次亲眼看到

translation.en: We had to cut into the bone and pull it out. That's how hard it hit.
translation.zh:
我们得切开骨头才把它拔出来
可见这一刀捅得有多狠

translation.en: Thirty-three and a half stab wounds in total.
translation.zh: 死者身上一共有三十三加半处刀伤

translation.en: Semen in her vaginal cavity, wrists were bound by rope.
translation.zh: 她的阴道里有精液 手腕被绳子捆住

translation.en: Checked with the lab, there weren't any fingerprints anywhere.
translation.zh:
我问过实验室那边
到处都没有发现指纹

translation.en: No bruises sustained below the waist. No sign of forced sexual contact.
translation.zh:
腰部以下没有瘀伤
没有强行性接触的痕迹

translation.en: Well, we still can't rule out rape, home?
translation.zh: 伙计 我们还不能排除强奸的可能

translation.en: No, that's right.
translation.zh: 是的 你说得对 我们还不能排除

translation.en: We also recovered blond hair that doesn't belong to the victim.
translation.zh:
我们还找到了
一些并不属于死者的金色毛发

translation.en: Let me see that.
Can I show you something strange?
See this on the edge of her left palm? It's not blood.
translation.zh:
看见她左掌边缘上的这东西了吗？
这不是血

translation.en: It's paint.
It's called calcimine.
They used it in old houses. They don't make it anymore.
translation.zh:
只有老房子才用这种涂料
现在已经停产了

translation.en: Found traces of it in the rug.
translation.zh: 我们在地毯上发现了少量这东西

translation.en: [Tom] What are these from?
Bruises. Probably a defensive wound.
translation.zh: 那些是瘀伤 大概是自卫时受的伤

translation.en: What happened to your hand?
Kitchen accident.
-[Allen] Fuck me. -What is it? Dark blue? Purple?
translation.zh:
我操 -那是什么颜色？深蓝色？紫色？
-邻居说那车子是什么颜色？

translation.en: [Vic] What color did the neighbor say it was?
translation.zh:
-那是什么颜色？深蓝色？紫色？
-邻居说那车子是什么颜色？

translation.en: The neighbor never saw the car.
translation.zh: 邻居并没有看到那车子

translation.en: This is the only angle we got?
translation.zh:
-只有这一个角度的监控吗？
-是的

translation.en: It's a Buick LeSabre.
[Vic] Yep. Buick LeSabre, 1990.
translation.zh: 对 是别克利萨博 1990年款的

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. Zoom in. Is it missing a hubcap?
translation.zh:
对不起 长官 放大一下
它是不是缺了一个轮毂盖？

translation.en: [Tom] Right there, huh?
[Allen] It's a good catch.
Who is that?
Summer and her ex-husband.
Can I borrow this?
translation.zh: 我能借用一下这照片吗？

translation.en: Sure, take whatever you want. I can't stay here.
translation.zh:
没问题 你想拿什么就拿吧
我在这儿也住不下去了

translation.en: [Tom] I understand.
You mind?
No.
She had only one computer?
Uh, yeah, just the laptop. She always took it with her.
translation.zh:
对 她只有那台笔记本电脑
她总是随身带着它

translation.en: Mr. Grady. Do you know if Summer had life insurance?
translation.zh:
格雷迪先生 你知不知道
萨默有没有买人寿保险？

translation.en: No, I don't know.
Okay.
It's easy to find out.
Thank you.
[whispers] I love this kitchen.
[woman on radio] 521, switch to channel six.
[woman on radio] All units, all units, we have a robbery in progress at 108…
translation.zh:
各单位注意
发生一起抢劫案 地点是108…

translation.en: Yeah. I don't know him.
[Tom] Okay.
Do you know if she had any secret admirers?
translation.zh: 你知不知道有没有谁暗恋她？

translation.en: No.
[Cleary] She's got no life insurance.
Check this out.
-[Tom] What am I watching? -Sam Gifford. The ex-husband.
translation.zh:
-这是什么？
-这人是死者的前夫山姆吉福德

translation.en: He's on file for a bunch of dope stuff.
translation.zh: 他有一系列涉毒的前科

translation.en: Apparently he collects human hair for his art.
translation.zh: 显然他在收集人的头发来搞他的艺术

translation.en: He ain't afraid.
A beauty school dropout, huh?
translation.zh: 看来是个美容学院的辍学生 对吧？

translation.en: [man] Excuse me.
Hey. Sorry.
[Tom] Afternoon.
We're with the Scarborough Police Department. And we're looking for Sam Gifford.
translation.zh:
我们是斯卡伯勒警察局的人
我们想找山姆吉福德

translation.en: [man] Okay. That's me.
[Tom] We'd like to talk to you about Summer Elswick.
translation.zh: 我们想跟你谈谈萨默埃尔西克的事

translation.en: Do you mind if we talk up front?
translation.zh: 我们能不能去前门那边谈？

translation.en: Is she okay?
Well, uh… not really.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 她不怎么好

translation.en: [Sam] What happened?
She was attacked by someone and she was stabbed.
translation.zh: 她遭到袭击 被人拿刀捅了

translation.en: Is she dead?
Yeah.
I'm sorry, Sam.
I'd like to ask you some questions.
Okay?
When was the last time you saw her?
translation.zh: 你最后一次见她是什么时候？

translation.en: Couple of months ago.
Where were you Saturday?
Uh, I was, uh… [clears throat] …fishing.
-Fishing up north near Jackson Lake. -And who'd you go with?
translation.zh:
-我去杰克逊湖北边钓鱼了
-你跟谁一起去的？

translation.en: I went alone.
-Like what time? -[Sam] Maybe, um…
translation.zh: 大概是几点去的？ 大概上午9点吧？

translation.en: nine a.m.?
[Cleary] What time d'you get back?
I got home last night.
-Is that your truck? -[Sam] Yeah, it is.
[Tom] Did you drive up in it?
-I did. -[Tom] Okay.
What's that on your hand?
translation.zh: 你手上沾着的那是什么？

translation.en: -It's paint. -[Cleary] Oh yeah?
Can I… Mind if I see it?
Am I a suspect?
Well, Mr. Gifford, right now everyone is a suspect. You understand.
translation.zh:
吉福德先生
眼下所有人都是嫌疑人 这你懂的

translation.en: -We're just trying to do our job. -Yeah, I understand.
translation.zh:
-我们只是在做我们该做的事
-对 我懂

translation.en: Um, if you guys aren't going to read me my rights, we're done here.
translation.zh:
如果你们不打算向我宣读我的权利
那就聊到这儿吧

translation.en: And if you are, I want a lawyer. Thank you.
translation.zh: 如果你们要宣读 那我要请律师

translation.en: [Tom] Wait!
-We're just trying to gather information. -[Sam] Have a nice day.
[Tom] William, Oklahoma, Mary, 755.
translation.zh: 威廉 俄克拉荷马 玛丽 755

translation.en: I need all the LPR northbound and southbound on I-35.
translation.zh:
我需要35号州际公路
南北双向的所有车牌识别信息

translation.en: Yeah. You got it buddy. Thank you.
translation.zh: 对 没错 老兄 谢谢

translation.en: By the way, why does Wally call you Oklahoma?
translation.zh: 话说 为什么沃利叫你俄克拉荷马？

translation.en: 'Cause I can cut a rug, baby.
[square dance caller] Sides face, grand square.
translation.zh: 副对面对面 大方块

translation.en: 50% of female victims are killed by their exes.
translation.zh:
50%的女性受害者
都是被她们的前夫杀害的

translation.en: [square dance caller] Four ladies chain.
Promenade.
Multiple stab wounds? I mean, that's a crime of passion.
translation.zh: 身上有多处刀伤 那明显是激情犯罪

translation.en: And if the husband's a drug user, you can bump that up to 90%.
translation.zh:
如果丈夫还是个瘾君子
那么那比例可以提高到90%

translation.en: -Baby, I'm concentrating. -[snickers, laughs]
translation.zh: 宝贝 我在专心跳舞呢

translation.en: [square dance caller] Allemande left, and a right-and-left grand.
translation.zh: 左阿勒曼德 然后大循环

translation.en: Keep the corner.
There you go. There you go.
-[Deena] Wally, what are you giving us? -He's promoting himself.
translation.zh:
-沃利 你给我们的这是什么？
-他在帮自己打广告

translation.en: -Here you go. -[Allen] His side business.
It even has a logo.
translation.zh: 这上面还有公司标志呢

translation.en: Now, please tell your uncle, it's called capitalism. And he could learn a thing or two.
translation.zh:
请告诉你的叔叔
这叫做资本主义 他可以学着点

translation.en: [Vic's wife] What is this, "Active Duty Security Consulting"?
translation.zh:
-给你
-这是什么？“现役警察安保咨询”？

translation.en: What's up with the bulldog?
translation.zh: 为什么用斗牛犬做标志？

translation.en: Because when we bite, we never let go.
translation.zh: 因为我们一旦咬住了 就绝不松口

translation.en: Come on, Wally, be honest. This ain't your logo. This is definitely your mugshot.
translation.zh:
沃利 说实话 这不是什么公司标志
这根本就是你的大头照

translation.en: Did you hear that? At least they got my good side.
translation.zh:
你听到了吗？
至少他们拍到了我好看的一面

translation.en: [Allen] Do you have to be walked twice a day?
translation.zh: 你是不是一定要一天遛两次？

translation.en: How long have you been with your lady?
translation.zh: 你跟你女朋友在一起多久了？

translation.en: Too long. Six years.
Why don't you marry her?
[Cleary] No fucking way.
How old are you, man?
Forty-five.
Coming up to that big five-oh.
You don't want to end up old and alone.
translation.zh: 你不会想一个人孤独终老的

translation.en: That's a real bitch.
I came into this world alone,
translation.zh: 我来到这个世界时是一个人

translation.en: I'll go through it alone, and I'm going to die alone.
translation.zh:
人生是我一个人过
然后我死的时候也会是一个人

translation.en: So fuck it. Okay, tough guy.
translation.zh:
-所以我他妈才不怕呢
-好吧 硬汉

translation.en: She sold half a dozen houses, no commissions.
translation.zh: 她卖了六栋房子 却没拿到佣金

translation.en: That'd piss me off.
translation.zh: 要是我的话 我会很生气

translation.en: [Tom] According to her records,
she didn't get commissions on six of her sales. Is that right?
translation.zh:
她有六单交易
没有拿到佣金 这情况属实吗？

translation.en: Well, it's… it's a little more complicated than that.
translation.zh: 这个 实际情况要比这复杂一点

translation.en: Her commissions went into the purchase of an investment property.
translation.zh: 她的佣金用来购买一处投资性房产了

translation.en: That way she didn't have to pay taxes. It's a townhouse on McKinley.
translation.zh:
-那样她就不用交税了
-买的是在麦金利的一栋联排别墅

translation.en: About how much money we talking about?
Uh, I think about 70 grand.
We don't touch it. It goes to the family.
translation.zh: 我们没碰那笔钱 那都归他们家所有

translation.en: Who owns 1502 Whitcomb, by the way?
translation.zh:
顺便问一句
惠特科姆1502号的业主是谁？

translation.en: I own it.
That's good to know. One less phone call we have to make.
translation.zh: 太好了 我们可以少打一个电话了

translation.en: [Cleary] Seventy grand.
She never got a divorce. That's a motive for the ex.
translation.zh:
她没有离婚
这样一来她前夫就有作案动机了

translation.en: [Tom] Maybe.
-[Deena] Let's see it. -[Judy] Eighteen grand.
translation.zh:
-好吧 说来听听
-一万八千美元

translation.en: Oh, that's a lot of money.
[Judy sighs] It's an investment if we ever want to sell it, but…
translation.zh:
如果我们想卖掉它的话
那这是一项投资 可是…

translation.en: That's awful. Who would do that?
translation.zh: 好过分啊 谁会做出这样的事啊？

translation.en: In Philly, when Tommy's partner was being investigated,
translation.zh: 在费城 当汤米的搭档被调查的时候

translation.en: we were dealing with all kinds of crazy shit.
translation.zh: 我们遇到过各种各样疯狂的事

translation.en: Tommy was sleeping with a gun under his pillow.
translation.zh: 汤米睡觉时枕头下都放着枪

translation.en: I was convinced he was gonna blow my tits off.
translation.zh:
我当时想
他肯定会一枪打烂我的乳房的

translation.en: -Where's my money? -Jesus Christ! What the fuck?
translation.zh:
-我的钱在哪儿？
-天啊！你他妈搞什么鬼啊？

translation.en: [Judy] The cops under investigation thought Tommy was gonna talk.
translation.zh: 那些被调查的警察以为汤米会招供

translation.en: They used to carve, like with a rock or something,
translation.zh: 所以他们经常用石头什么的刻字

translation.en: they used to carve this shit into the windshield of my car,
translation.zh: 他们经常在我车子的挡风玻璃上刻字

translation.en: like, "Cheese-eater. Admit the rat in you."
translation.zh: 像“叛徒 承认是你告的密吧”之类的

translation.en: That must have been hell.
[Judy] Ugh, you have no idea. That's why we had to leave.
translation.zh:
你根本无法想象
那就是我们不得不离开的原因

translation.en: -[Wally] It's Paul's birthday. Sign it. -Jesus. You're fucking crazy.
translation.zh:
-今天是保罗的生日 签个名吧
-真是的 你他妈太疯狂了

translation.en: He's gonna love it. Not the right tit. That's for Allen.
translation.zh:
他会喜欢的 别签在右边奶子上
那里是留给艾伦的

translation.en: Tommy was so depressed he wouldn't come out of the bedroom.
translation.zh: 汤米很抑郁 他窝在卧室里不肯出来

translation.en: It knocked the life out of us. Never again.
translation.zh:
我们的生活都被毁了
我们再也不想过那样的日子了

translation.en: If it wasn't for my uncle and Deena, who knows where we'd be.
translation.zh:
要不是有我叔叔和蒂娜
天知道我们会沦落到哪儿去

translation.en: So how's Mr. Detective Cleary doing?
translation.zh: 克利里警探表现得如何？

translation.en: Well, aside from never wearing a tie… he's doing pretty good.
translation.zh:
这个嘛 除了从不打领带这点
他表现得还挺好的

translation.en: Good. Because I taught him everything he knows.
translation.zh:
很好 因为他知道的一切
都是我教给他的

translation.en: Not everything I know. Everything he knows.
translation.zh:
但那并不是我知道的一切
只是他知道的一切而已

translation.en: [Judy] Uncle Allen had a scare.
What do you mean?
He was in the hot tub and he couldn't get out. He couldn't move.
translation.zh: 他在热水浴缸里出不来 他动不了

translation.en: Deena had to pull him out all by herself.
How is he now? He's fine.
translation.zh:
-他现在怎么样了？
-他没什么事

translation.en: -Deena should've called us. -I know.
translation.zh:
-蒂娜应该打电话给我们的
-我知道

translation.en: [sighs] She's worried that it's only going to get worse now.
translation.zh: 现在她担心情况只会越来越糟糕

translation.en: [Will] Jesus Christ.
Yes?
[man] Yes, sorry to bother you. I think I accidentally got some of your mail.
translation.zh:
是的 抱歉打扰了
我好像不小心拿错了你的邮件

translation.en: Thank you.
Oh wait, that's… This is mine.
translation.zh: 等等 那封… 这封是我的

translation.en: I don't… This one was open already.
translation.zh: 我不…这封之前就已经拆开了

translation.en: This is mine, that's yours.
translation.zh: 这封是我的 那封是你的

translation.en: That's yours. That's yours. All the rest are yours. Okay. All right, thank you.
translation.zh:
-那封也是你的 剩下的都是你的
-好 好了 谢谢你

translation.en: You don't remember me?
No, I'm sorry.
[man] Well, I guess, uh…
I wouldn't remember me either. You know, if I were you.
translation.zh: 如果我是你的话 我也不会记得我的

translation.en: Is your mother home? Your mother would remember me.
translation.zh: 你妈在家吗？你妈会记得我的

translation.en: I just wanted to give you my condolences. That's it.
translation.zh: 我只是想向你表示哀悼 为了…

translation.en: -Move your fucking foot! -No problem.
What the fuck?
[Cleary] Her phone pinged in Limerick at 19:40 the night before she was killed.
translation.zh:
定位显示在她遇害前一晚的19点40分
她的手机位于利默里克

translation.en: -[Tom] Where the fuck is Limerick? -About 45 minutes east.
translation.zh:
-利默里克他妈的在哪儿？
-在东边 距离这儿大概45分钟的路程

translation.en: She sold a property there.
translation.zh: 她卖过一栋在那里的房子

translation.en: Why would she go back?
[Cleary] To show it.
No.
She sold it 14 months ago.
translation.zh: 那房子是她14个月前卖掉的

translation.en: Can I help you?
And, uh, who's been painting it?
Church members volunteer. I'm the caretaker. I just watch the place.
translation.zh:
是教友们自愿干的
我是看门人 我只负责看管这里

translation.en: Okay.
So…
have you seen her before?
I… I don't recognize her.
-No? -Mm-mm.
How about that car?
No, I haven't seen it.
Okay, well, one more.
translation.zh: 好吧 还有一个问题

translation.en: How about this gentleman?
[murmurs] No, I haven't seen him.
-Okay, well… oh for three. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 好吧 三个问题都是否定的回答

translation.en: [Tom] At least we know where the paint came from.
translation.zh: 至少我们知道那些涂料是哪儿来的了

translation.en: [Cleary] Yeah. And the hair came back. It's a wig.
translation.zh: 是啊 那些毛发有结果了 那些是假发

translation.en: [Tom] What about the number that called her?
translation.zh:
-那打给她的那个号码呢？
-那是一部一次性手机的

translation.en: [Cleary] It's a burner. It only dialed one number. Summer's.
translation.zh:
-那打给她的那个号码呢？
-那是一部一次性手机的 它只打过一个号码 就是萨默的

translation.en: It was activated the day before the murder. The day she received the initial call.
translation.zh:
它是在案发前一天激活的
就是她接到第一通电话的那天

translation.en: It was used to make six calls to Summer. After the murder, nothing.
translation.zh:
有人用它打了六通电话给萨默
案发之后就再也没打过任何电话了

translation.en: Get me the video from the store.
Yeah, we tried. They wiped it.
translation.zh: 我们去问过了 他们删掉了

translation.en: Oh great. So we got a wig and shit.
translation.zh:
好极了 这么说
我们就只有假发这一条线索了

translation.en: [Judy] I'd call that grape purple.
Okay. We got a purple Buick.
translation.zh: 好吧 所以这是一辆紫色的别克

translation.en: It's not a Buick.
This is the car I drove in college. It's a Chrysler Imperial from the '90s.
translation.zh:
这是我读大学时开过的车
这是一辆90年代的克莱斯勒帝国

translation.en: You see that slit right there? That's a window.
translation.zh: 看见那里的那道缝了吗？那是一扇窗

translation.en: My dad got me one. Everyone thought I was a narc.
translation.zh:
我爸给我买过一辆
大家都以为我是个缉毒警

translation.en: Here, let me show you.
Is that the car you lost your virginity in?
translation.zh: 你就是在那辆车上破处的吗？

translation.en: -No. It was a different car. -[Tom] Hm.
translation.zh: 不 是在另一辆车上

translation.en: -And it was in high school. -Oh, that's right.
translation.zh:
-而且那是我读高中的时候
-是啊

translation.en: You were 14. That's gross.
translation.zh: 你那时才14岁 真恶心

translation.en: You're gross.
You lost your virginity to a prostitute.
Look, you see the eyelids right there on the headlights? They open and close.
translation.zh:
你看 看见这车灯的灯盖了吗？
它们会翻开和盖上

translation.en: -["Oogum Boogum Song" ringtone sounds] -Oh. Unknown caller.
Who could that be? Your hooker?
Hello?
You got this August 26th?
Uh, let me check the invoice.
No. Received May 26th.
Is this the original paint?
[dealer] Uh, yes, it is. Factory paint.
Okay, thank you.
-[dealer] Anything you need, let me know. -[Cleary] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你们有什么需要尽管告诉我
-好

translation.en: -What year is this Silverado? -[dealer] 2020.
translation.zh:
-这辆索罗德是哪一年的？
-2020年的

translation.en: -How many miles? -[dealer] Thirty thousand.
translation.zh:
-里程数是多少？
-四万八千公里左右

translation.en: Cleary. Come check it out.
It's nice, huh? Yeah.
Fifty K. You can afford that?
translation.zh: 这车要五万美元啊 你买得起吗？

translation.en: Hell yeah.
Really?
You're forgetting one thing.
What's that?
The overtime, baby. Milk it.
translation.zh: 加班费啊 伙计 拼命加班挣就是了

translation.en: -Does it have rear video? -[dealer] Yes, sir. Rear and front.
translation.zh:
-有后置摄像头吗？
-有 先生 前后都有

translation.en: [woman] She was precious. [Will] She was.
Thank you. And I'm so glad that I could be here.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你 我很高兴我今天能到场
-我也很高兴你能来

translation.en: Thank you, son.
[Will] Hey.
Hey, stop!
[man on video] The Chrysler Imperial and the New Yorker Fifth Avenue that shares…
translation.zh: 克莱斯勒帝国和纽约客第五大道…

translation.en: …are the biggest Chryslers you can buy.
translation.zh: …你能买到的最大的克莱斯勒车型

translation.en: [Tom] My condolences, Will.
Um, can I talk to you for a second? Of course.
translation.zh:
-我可以跟你聊几句吗？
-当然可以

translation.en: A few nights ago,
this guy we know showed up at my mother's house.
translation.zh: 我们认识的一个人出现在我妈家门前

translation.en: He was acting strange and…
translation.zh: 他的举止很奇怪 而且…

translation.en: Strange in what way?
He tried to force himself inside the house.
-How? -I went to close the door. -[Tom] Uh-huh? -He puts his foot in the door.
translation.zh:
-他怎么闯的？
-我想关门 结果他伸脚挡住了门

translation.en: Okay. What's his name?
Eli Phillips.
How do you know him?
We bought a piece of land to develop. This is when my dad ran the company.
translation.zh:
我们买了一块地来开发
那时候公司还是我爸在经营

translation.en: It was a farm. A family farm.
translation.zh: 那里原来是一座农场 一座家庭农场

translation.en: We gave them a fair price. They still didn't want to sell.
translation.zh:
我们出的价钱很公道
可他们还是不想卖

translation.en: I guess they really didn't have a choice.
Anyway, after we bought it,
translation.zh: 总之 在我们买下那里之后

translation.en: the father committed suicide.
And the son blamed it on us.
translation.zh: 然后他把这怪到了我们头上

translation.en: He's tried to hack into our server a few times. Our IT guy keeps blocking him.
translation.zh:
他几次试图入侵我们的服务器
都被我们的IT人员拦截了

translation.en: I understand.
But, uh, there's not much we can do.
translation.zh: 但我们也没什么能做的

translation.en: Unless he shows up again.
And if he does,
you call me.
Anytime.
Thanks.
I've been abused, harassed, tortured, bullied…
translation.zh:
我一直受到
虐待、骚扰、折磨、欺凌…

translation.en: [Cleary] He was at Whitcomb.
[Eli] The police aren't gonna do anything…
translation.zh: 可警察什么也不会做 他们根本不管

translation.en: These are the people Summer called in the last three months. [Tom] Good.
translation.zh:
-萨默过去三个月给这些人打过电话
-很好

translation.en: The FBI has a record that she called them and wanted to report narcotics activity.
translation.zh:
联邦调查局有记录显示
她曾打过电话给他们想举报毒品活动

translation.en: Apparently, they gave her the number for the DEA. They say she never called.
translation.zh:
显然他们给了她缉毒局的号码
可缉毒局说她没打电话过去

translation.en: Hey, Smith. Not bad for a rookie.
translation.zh:
嘿 史密斯 作为一个新人
你表现得还不错

translation.en: [Smith] Thanks, boss.
[Eli] Fuck off!
You know…
[Tom] Eli Phillips?
translation.zh:
你是伊莱菲利普斯吗？
我是汤姆尼克尔斯警探

translation.en: I'm Detective Tom Nichols. This is my partner Dan Cleary.
translation.zh:
你是伊莱菲利普斯吗？
我是汤姆尼克尔斯警探 这位是我的搭档丹克利里

translation.en: Got a minute to chat?
About what?
Summer Elswick.
Summer… [murmurs]
Yeah, sure. No problem. Just give me one second. Let me put some clothes on.
translation.zh: 好 没问题 等我一下 我穿件衣服

translation.en: Hey, how you doing? You have any weapons on you?
translation.zh: 嘿 你好吗？你身上有武器吗？

translation.en: [Eli] No.
Okay. You mind turning around? Just turn around.
translation.zh: 你可以转过身去吗？转过去

translation.en: Just put your arms out. Yep.
translation.zh: 把手举起来 对 就是这样

translation.en: Anything, uh, sharp in your pockets that might surprise me?
translation.zh:
我不会在你的口袋里
意外发现什么利器吧？

translation.en: [Eli] No.
Hey, you know what? We have the same birthday, me and you.
translation.zh:
嘿 你知道吗？
我们的生日是同一天 我和你

translation.en: -No shit. -[Eli] Yep.
Geminis, right?
Gemini? May 26?
translation.zh:
你是双子座吗？
你的生日是5月26日 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
We're like, uh, twins. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们就像孪生兄弟一样

translation.en: Saw you outside of Whitcomb the other night.
translation.zh:
前几天晚上
我们在惠特科姆外面看见你了

translation.en: Yeah. 'Cause I was there.
translation.zh: 对 因为我确实在那儿

translation.en: Yeah? What were you doing there?
I heard about it.
translation.zh: 我听说了那里发生的事

translation.en: [Cleary] Yeah? So how'd you hear about it?
Uh, police scanner.
translation.zh: 我听警方通讯接收器里说的

translation.en: It's a little hobby of mine.
I can tell you who did it, if you guys want me to.
translation.zh:
如果你们想的话
我可以告诉你们那是谁干的

translation.en: Okay, who's that?
Will Grady.
Funny, he just told us you showed up at his mother's and threatened both of them.
translation.zh:
这就有意思了 他跟我们说
你跑去他母亲家 还威胁他们母子俩

translation.en: He said… that I… Well, that's a lie.
I didn't threaten anybody.
-Yeah, they're both lying, both liars. -[Tom] Anyway.
translation.zh:
没错 他们都在说谎 他们都是骗子 总之 如果你再跑去他们家
你的行为将被视为恐吓证人

translation.en: If you go back, it's gonna be considered intimidation of a witness,
translation.zh:
总之 如果你再跑去他们家
你的行为将被视为恐吓证人

translation.en: and you're gonna be arrested.
translation.zh:
-我们将会逮捕你 明白吗？
-我没威胁…

translation.en: -I didn't threaten-- -No. Listen to me. You're gonna be arrested. You understand?
translation.zh:
不 你听我说
我们会逮捕你的 你明白了吗？

translation.en: You know, I know who you are.
translation.zh: 我跟你讲 我知道你是谁

translation.en: I read an article about you, uh, and your partner.
translation.zh: 我看过一篇关于你和你搭档的报道

translation.en: Corzano? Convicted for drugs, gambling, uh, bribery.
translation.zh:
他叫科尔萨诺 对吧？
因吸毒、赌博和贿赂而被定罪

translation.en: You didn't know that?
You known him six years?
You didn't know anything about it?
That sounds like a lie to me.
Why were you really at Whitcomb the night she was killed?
translation.zh:
她遇害那晚
你到底为什么会在惠特科姆？

translation.en: Because I wanted to see Will Grady
translation.zh: 因为我想看到威尔格雷迪

translation.en: in, uh… in handcuffs.
-[Eli sniffles] -[Tom] Why? Because he's the devil. That's why.
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-因为他是恶魔 那就是原因

translation.en: He's a crook. They're all crooks.
translation.zh: 他是个骗子 他们都是骗子

translation.en: Like your partner. [sniffles]
Did you have anything to do with Summer's death?
No.
Good. You mind if we take a sample of your DNA?
translation.zh:
-你介意我们采集一下你的DNA吗？
-不介意

translation.en: -Cool. Let's do it now. -[Eli] You mean here? Now?
translation.zh:
-好 我们马上来吧
-什么意思？现在当场采吗？

translation.en: [Tom and Cleary] Yeah.
I meant, no, I don't… I don't… Uh, wouldn't like that right now.
translation.zh: 不 我不要…不想现在采

translation.en: -I don't like needles. -It's not needles. It's a Q-tip.
translation.zh:
-我不喜欢扎针
-这不是针 是棉签

translation.en: -[Eli] Oh, they're doing Q-tips now. -It's just a swab.
translation.zh:
-现在是用棉签了啊
-拭抹一下就好

translation.en: -Should I talk to a lawyer? -No, you don't need to talk to a lawyer.
translation.zh:
-我是不是应该找律师？
-不 你没必要找律师

translation.en: Call me when you make up your mind. Okay?
translation.zh: 你下定决心了就打给我吧 好吗？

translation.en: Stay away from the Gradys.
translation.zh: 别再去骚扰格雷迪一家了

translation.en: And take it easy with that hat. You don't want to get hurt.
translation.zh:
还有 别再戴那顶帽子了
你也不想受伤吧？

translation.en: [Eli] I respect the police.
[Marty] What do we know about the husband?
translation.zh: 她丈夫那边有什么进展了？

translation.en: We got his license plate up at Jackson Lake at the time of the murder.
translation.zh:
案发时他的车牌
的确出现在杰克逊湖附近

translation.en: You got his car there. You don't have him.
translation.zh:
他的车子是出现在那里
可开车的人又不一定是他

translation.en: She called the FBI to report narcotics. Do we have a record of her calling us?
translation.zh:
她曾打给联邦调查局举报毒品活动
我们这边有她打过给我们的记录吗？

translation.en: -[approaching footsteps] -No, sir. We checked.
translation.zh: 没有 长官 我们查过了

translation.en: Who do we like for the DNA?
translation.zh:
-你们赌那DNA是谁的？
-噢 拜托

translation.en: -[Marty] Oh, come on… -Jesus.
translation.zh:
-你们赌那DNA是谁的？
-噢 拜托 老天爷啊

translation.en: I got the boyfriend for 20.
Come on, Nichols. Who do you got?
translation.zh: 来吧 尼克尔斯 你押谁？

translation.en: -Look at Allen. A steady rolling man. -[all chuckle]
translation.zh: 你们看艾伦 多么稳重的男人啊

translation.en: All right, I'll go with Will Grady, the boyfriend.
translation.zh: 好吧 我押她的男朋友威尔格雷迪

translation.en: Ah, okay. Safe bet.
What about you, Vic? Who do you got?
translation.zh: 你呢 维克？你要押谁？

translation.en: Let me ask you guys a question. When you interviewed the Eli guy,
translation.zh:
我问个问题
你们找那个叫伊莱的家伙问话时

translation.en: did he have a blond wig on by any chance?
translation.zh: 他有没有戴着金色的假发？

translation.en: Nah, I'll take Eli.
-[Allen] Okay. -Nichols' twin.
I'm going with the fisherman. The ex-husband.
translation.zh: 我押那个钓鱼佬 她的前夫

translation.en: -Here you go. -All right.
Sir?
Uh, I'll pass.
Remind me again why we never put out an APB on the Chrysler?
translation.zh:
谁能再跟我解释一下
为什么我们没有发全境通告 追查那辆克莱斯勒？

translation.en: -Well, we just got a verification. -Okay, then let's do it.
translation.zh:
-我们刚刚才证实那是辆克莱斯勒
-好吧 那就去查吧

translation.en: -Okay. -[Allen] Hold up.
There are 8,000 Chryslers in the county.
translation.zh: 全县有近八千辆克莱斯勒

translation.en: We're going to start a wild goose chase, get everybody scared.
translation.zh:
那样查只会白费时间和精力
还会搞得人心惶惶

translation.en: We're going to be getting the DNA any moment.
translation.zh: DNA的比对结果很快就会出来

translation.en: We don't get the gift, then we go after the Chrysler.
translation.zh:
如果那头不顺利
我们再去查那辆克莱斯勒好了

translation.en: Okay. Okay. All right.
Okay, here we go. [clears throat]
-Thank you. -[Marty] Thank you so much.
-Make some space. -Move that. Deena's just getting drinks.
translation.zh:
-我来拿开这个
-蒂娜在拿喝的东西

translation.en: [Marty] Okay. Here we go. [Allen] One beer is not gonna kill the old man.
translation.zh:
-好 我们开吃吧
-一瓶啤酒要不了老头子的命的

translation.en: -[Marty] Who wants pepperoni and sausage? -Gimme one of those.
translation.zh:
-他要意式辣香肠和香肠的
-给我一块那种的

translation.en: Let me ask you something. Does that look like a bite mark to you?
translation.zh:
我问你个问题
你觉得这看着像咬痕吗？

translation.en: -[Allen] That's good. -[Cleary] All right. That looks good.
translation.zh: 那个不错 好 那个看起来不错

translation.en: -[Marty] Who wants cheese? Anybody? -[Allen] Thank you.
-[Marty] Anybody? Anybody? -[Cleary] I got one. Thank you.
Hey, we're still doing that walk-through with the boyfriend, right?
translation.zh:
我们还是会跟她男朋友一起
去做现场重现 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah. When do you want to do it?
translation.zh: 对 你想什么时候做？

translation.en: The sooner, the better.
Can you turn the recorder off, please?
translation.zh: 你们能把录音机关了吗？

translation.en: Have you talked to Sam Gifford yet?
translation.zh: 你们找山姆吉福德谈过了吗？

translation.en: [Tom] Yes, we have.
Did he tell you they were still seeing each other?
translation.zh: 他有没有告诉你们 他俩还有来往？

translation.en: [Tom] No.
Well, they were.
[Tom] How do you know that?
I was there.
You were where?
They used to fool around in some of the houses.
translation.zh: 他们经常在一些房子里乱搞

translation.en: Last time we talked,
translation.zh: 等等 上次我们找你问话时

translation.en: you said you didn't know the ex-husband, and now you do.
translation.zh:
你说你不认识她的前夫
现在你又认识了

translation.en: Why are you telling us now?
My ex didn't want me talking to you guys.
translation.zh: 我前夫不想我跟你们说话

translation.en: Why is that?
Him and Sam work together.
[Cleary] What kind of work does he do?
He sells heroin and coke.
Was Summer involved with drugs?
No.
-You think I can change my bet? -[snickers]
-I'm not wearing a tie. -You have to. Everybody will be wearing one.
translation.zh:
-我不要打领带
-你必须打 大家都会打

translation.en: Stop it. I got it.
translation.zh: 别看着我 我自己会打

translation.en: -I walked in the front door. -[cell phone vibrating]
-And stopped right where you are. -[cell phone clicks]
translation.zh: 然后在你们站着的这个位置停了下来

translation.en: Uh, I noticed her shoes right here.
translation.zh: 我注意到她的鞋子摆在这里

translation.en: Is that unusual?
[Will] Not really. You want to protect the floor.
translation.zh: 也不是 脱鞋是为了保护地板

translation.en: Um, so, I, uh…
I called out for her.
Um, no answer.
I try her phone, nothing.
translation.zh: 我又打她手机 没人接

translation.en: And then what?
I, uh…
I kneeled down
to, uh…
to try to give her, uh, CPR.
[coughs] I'm sorry.
-[Tom] Excuse me. -[ringtone stops]
[Allen] Excuse me.
[Cleary] Have all responding units set up a perimeter.
translation.zh: 让所有响应的单位拉起警戒线

translation.en: Suspect is male, Caucasian, 33, 6'2", 190 pounds, brown hair.
translation.zh:
嫌疑人为男性 白人 33岁
身高188厘米 体重86公斤 棕色头发

translation.en: Hey, Sam. Can you come to the door?
translation.zh: 嘿 山姆 你能到门口这儿来吗？

translation.en: Open the door.
Are you alone here?
translation.zh:
-这里就你一个人吗？
-是的 你们要干什么？

translation.en: -[Sam] Yes. What do you want? -Got an arrest warrant for you.
translation.zh:
-这里就你一个人吗？
-是的 你们要干什么？ -我们有你的逮捕令
-为什么要逮捕我？

translation.en: -[scoffs] For what? -I think you know.
translation.zh:
-我们有你的逮捕令
-为什么要逮捕我？ -你自己应该很清楚
-你得跟我们走

translation.en: -You'll have to come with us. -[Cleary] Relax. Come on.
translation.zh:
-你自己应该很清楚
-你得跟我们走 放松点 来吧 哥们
我们去拿你的衣服 好吗？走吧

translation.en: Let's go get your clothes. All right? Come on.
translation.zh:
放松点 来吧 哥们
我们去拿你的衣服 好吗？走吧

translation.en: -[Sam] What? Why? -We got a hit on your DNA.
translation.zh:
-什么？为什么啊？
-死者身上的DNA跟你的吻合

translation.en: -Yeah, we were sleeping together. -Okay, good.
translation.zh: 我是跟她上过床 好 具体的等到了局里再说 走吧

translation.en: You can tell us all about it at the station. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好 具体的等到了局里再说 走吧

translation.en: [Sam] Wait, I gotta go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 等等 我要去上个厕所

translation.en: [Cleary] Okay, let's go to the bathroom.
-[suspenseful music playing] -[Cleary grunting] Sam! Shit! Fuck! Goddamn it!
-[Tom] Are you hit? -No. He's got my gun.
translation.zh:
-你有没有受伤？
-没有 他抢走了我的枪

translation.en: Fuck.
Sam. Put the gun down. Put your hands up.
translation.zh: 山姆 把枪放下 举起手来

translation.en: Cuff him.
He's dead.
What are you, a doctor?
Cuff him.
[Wally] Thirteen kilos of heroin.
translation.zh: 我们搜出了13公斤海洛因

translation.en: We'll have the dogs go through the house. So far so good.
translation.zh:
我们还会让缉毒犬来搜一遍房子
但目前的收获还不错

translation.en: Pretty fucking exciting, huh?
Check this out.
Bullet went in, still stuck.
translation.zh: 子弹打了进去 还卡在这里

translation.en: That's why he shot at us.
translation.zh: 这就是他朝我们开枪的原因

translation.en: [Cleary] Hey.
I'm sorry.
We're going to need your gun.
-[Allen] Call your rep. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-打电话给你的工会代表吧
-好

translation.en: The suit you asked me about is back.
translation.zh: 你之前问我的那套西装我拿回来了

translation.en: Thought they were done with the banging.
translation.zh: 我以为他们要砸的都砸完了

translation.en: Well, they have to replace a thing for your faucet.
translation.zh:
他们要换个东西
好装你的那个水龙头

translation.en: -Pretty frustrating. -[Judy] Mm.
Don't mention nothing about the limp.
Nothing about the Chrysler.
Nothing about the fact that they were having an affair.
translation.zh: 没提他们还藕断丝连的事

translation.en: They're washing their hands.
You don't have to wash yours.
But I don't want you being upset over a guy who tried to kill you.
translation.zh:
但我不想你
为了一个想杀死你的人而难过

translation.en: [Marty] Yeah, I'll make sure of it. Yeah, it'll be good. All right. See you.
translation.zh:
好 我会确保这一点的
好 不会有问题的 好 再见

translation.en: You pissed clean.
Now we just got to get you requalled with your weapon.
translation.zh:
现在只需要让你重新取得
持枪资格就行了

translation.en: You good with that?
[Allen] He's ready.
There you go.
Oh, thanks.
Oh, and hey, Tom?
Next time, shoot him in the front. Makes this shit go a whole lot easier.
translation.zh:
下次再有这样的情况 朝他正面开枪
那样会少很多麻烦

translation.en: [bartender] It's from the ladies over there.
translation.zh: 这是那边那两位女士请你喝的

translation.en: [Will] What do you ladies do?
translation.zh: 你们两位美女是做什么的？

translation.en: I work at Stone Mountain.
And you?
I don't know.
-[Will] You don't know? -She wants to get into real estate.
translation.zh:
-你不知道？
-她想进房地产行业

translation.en: So you let other people make up their minds for you?
translation.zh: 所以你都是让别人替你做决定吗？

translation.en: No. No.
-I know a guy. -Oh.
-I do know a guy. I know a guy. -He knows a guy.
translation.zh:
-我真的认识一个人 我认识一个人
-他认识一个人

translation.en: He knows a guy.
Who kn… Who knows a guy.
That's what happened.
I still feel bad though.
I lied.
A… About knowing that she was still
translation.zh: 我说我不知道她跟她前夫

translation.en: sleeping with her ex.
translation.zh: 还藕断丝连 但其实我知道

translation.en: We all get fleeced.
I was married.
And my husband told his mistress I was his roommate.
translation.zh: 我老公跟他的情妇说我是他的室友

translation.en: -[snickers] I'm sor… I'm sorry. -Wait… [laughs]
-I'm sorry. That… [laughing] -What? I mean, it's fine. It's fine!
translation.zh:
-对不起 那…
-什么啊？没关系

translation.en: Get her home safe.
[woman] You were raised by your mom?
[Tom] Why do you say that?
[woman] I assume because you took your mother's last name.
translation.zh:
因为你随你母亲姓
所以我认为是她把你养大的

translation.en: [Tom] Oh, no. I was raised by my father.
translation.zh: 不 我是我父亲养大的

translation.en: [woman] And your mother?
I don't know my mother.
[woman] I'm sorry to hear that.
[Tom] That's all right.
So, as you know, this session is just a requirement so you can get back to work.
translation.zh:
你也知道 这次咨询只是
你复职前的一个必要环节

translation.en: [Tom] Sounds good.
[woman] How have you been feeling?
[Tom] Fine.
[woman] How are you sleeping?
[Tom] Pretty good now.
But you know, for years I've had this dream.
translation.zh: 可是多年来我一直做一个梦

translation.en: It's a recurring dream where I'm in someone's house and there's people there.
translation.zh:
那是一个反复出现的梦
我身处某人的家里 那里有很多人

translation.en: It's like a party or something.
And then these bad guys come in, and they start shooting at everyone.
translation.zh:
然后进来了几个坏蛋
他们开始朝所有人开枪

translation.en: And every time I get my gun out…
I can't pull the trigger.
It's a real nightmare.
[woman] That's a very common dream among law enforcement.
translation.zh: 执法部门里的很多人都做过那样的梦

translation.en: [Tom] Really?
Well, you know what's happened?
Since the shooting,
I've had that same dream,
but now I get to pull the trigger.
translation.zh: 但现在我可以扣动扳机了

translation.en: Interesting, huh?
-I hate you. -Hey, Wally, how long you been a dope dog?
translation.zh:
-我恨你
-嘿 沃利 你当缉毒犬多久了？

translation.en: Twenty-four years. Why?
And you still can't tell when someone's bluffing? [laughs]
translation.zh:
那你怎么还看不出
别人什么时候是在装？

translation.en: Bam!
[Wally] Except your wife. I know when she's bluffing.
translation.zh:
你老婆除外
我知道她什么时候是在装

translation.en: -[Vic] Fuck you. -[man] Vic, tell me what a dope dog is.
translation.zh:
-去你妈的
-嘿 维克 缉毒犬是什么梗？

translation.en: -An old-ass narc like him. [chuckles] -[Wally] Oh boy.
translation.zh:
-就是指像他这样的缉毒警
-噢 天啊

translation.en: [man] I got you.
-Hey, Allen, you're in? -No, deal me out. Deal me out.
translation.zh:
-嘿 艾伦 你还玩吗？
-不了 别发牌给我了

translation.en: You gotta take care of yourself. Take care of your family.
translation.zh: 你得照顾好你自己 照顾好你的家人

translation.en: Look at Allen.
He's sick. I'm not supposed to say nothin', but look at him.
translation.zh: 他病了 我不该说的 可是你看看他

translation.en: Shit happens. You gotta think about your future.
translation.zh:
世事无常 你得为你的家人想想
你不可能永远当警察的

translation.en: -You can't be a cop forever. -[bottle clangs]
translation.zh:
你得为你的家人想想
你不可能永远当警察的

translation.en: -Shit, man. -[Wally] Paul!
-Come on. You're ruining my carpet. -[Paul] Sorry about that.
-Sorry about that, Wally. I'm sorry. -[Wally] Cost a lot of money.
translation.zh:
-对不起 沃利 对不起 维克
-那很贵的

translation.en: -It's all right. -[Paul] Man, did I get you guys?
-[Wally] Two-hundred-pound gorilla. -I got it.
-[Wally] Now, make sure you dab that. -[clears throat]
[Wally] You're lucky I love you.
Anyway, I got a gig for you at my shop. If you want it.
translation.zh:
总之 如果你想的话
我的公司有个适合你的职位

translation.en: Active Duty Security consultant.
You like that? My idea.
translation.zh: 这名字你喜欢吗？是我想出来的

translation.en: All cops, ex-military, all good guys, easy money.
translation.zh:
里面全是警察和退伍军人
都是好人 干的活也轻松

translation.en: All you gotta do is stand outside a prince's penthouse.
translation.zh:
你只要在某个大富豪的
顶层豪华公寓外面站一下就行了

translation.en: It's nothing.
Just something for you to think about.
translation.zh: 我只是想让你考虑一下

translation.en: That's a nice watch, Wally.
translation.zh: 你那块表不错啊 沃利

translation.en: Keep it.
I dunno.
[Wally] I want you to have it.
I don't give a fuck. It's a Rolex. It's just a watch.
translation.zh:
我他妈不在乎
这是块劳力士 就是块表而已

translation.en: It's your watch, Wally. I don't want it.
translation.zh: 这是你的表 沃利 我不想要

translation.en: Thank you.
Wally, if he doesn't want it, I'll take it.
translation.zh: 沃利 他不要的话我要

translation.en: How many bad guys you caught this week?
I'm gonna tell you. None.
translation.zh: 我来告诉你吧 一个也没有

translation.en: I know.
Which one you want?
Seriously, pick one.
I'm married, Wally.
So what? Hey…
Come on, pick one.
I'm good, I'm good.
All right.
If you get a headache and go upstairs, I'll make sure one of 'em brings you a Tylenol.
translation.zh:
如果你头痛想上楼去躺一下
我就让一个妞拿点泰诺去给你

translation.en: How's that sound?
It's a big house. Nobody's gonna find out.
translation.zh: 这房子很大 没人会发现的

translation.en: Look, I had a long talk with Graeber,
and we're going to recommend you for the Medal of Valor.
translation.zh: 我们打算举荐你拿英勇勋章

translation.en: I don't want a medal for killing someone.
translation.zh: 我不想因为杀人而获得勋章

translation.en: You're not getting it for killing Gifford.
translation.zh: 那勋章不是为了表彰你杀了吉福德

translation.en: You're getting it for saving Cleary's life.
translation.zh: 而是为了表彰你救了克利里的命

translation.en: Been doing some soul-searching.
Took your advice.
Oh yeah?
What's that? No more Mr. Tough Guy. Getting married.
translation.zh:
-什么建议？
-不再当硬汉了 跟我女朋友结婚

translation.en: Congratulations.
-That's awesome. -Thanks.
Yeah, we haven't set a date yet, but, uh…
translation.zh: 我们还没定好日子 不过…

translation.en: be honored if you'd be my best man.
translation.zh: 如果你能给我当伴郎 我会很荣幸的

translation.en: Best man, huh?
That's a lot of work, Dan.
-Okay, okay, uh… How about an usher? -[loud thud]
translation.zh: 好吧 那当引宾员如何？

translation.en: An usher. Yeah.
We can do that. [Cleary] Okay, good.
My future mother-in-law's already up my ass
translation.zh:
我的未来丈母娘
已经在催我去做精子检测了

translation.en: about getting my sperm tested, make sure I'm still potent.
translation.zh:
我的未来丈母娘
已经在催我去做精子检测了 以确保我还能生育

translation.en: I hate when that happens.
[Tom] Right there. Right there. Right there. Right there.
Yeah.
[Tom] That's a bite.
It was the dentals that got Ted Bundy.
translation.zh: 泰德邦迪就是因为牙印而被抓到的

translation.en: [man] I'm pretty sure you're right. This looks like a human bite to me.
translation.zh:
我敢肯定你是对的
在我看来那确实很像人的咬痕

translation.en: So what do you want me to do?
You tell me. You're the expert.
translation.zh: 你告诉我啊 你是专家

translation.en: Get me the dentals of this Gifford guy and maybe we can rule him out.
translation.zh:
帮我弄到吉福德的牙齿印模
或许我们就能证明他不是凶手

translation.en: Who confirmed that this is a human bite?
translation.zh: 是谁确认这是人的咬痕的？

translation.en: A forensic odontologist friend of mine I used in Philly.
translation.zh:
我在费城时认识的
一位当法医牙医师的朋友

translation.en: How do we know those weren't there from a few days before?
translation.zh:
我们怎么知道那些牙印
不是案发前几天留下的？

translation.en: Well, unless her hands were tied in that position two days before,
translation.zh:
除非死者的手
曾在案发前两天被那样子捆住过

translation.en: that was done at Whitcomb.
translation.zh: 不然那就是在惠特科姆留下的

translation.en: So?
What do you want to do?
I want to get Sam Gifford's dental impressions.
translation.zh: 我想取得山姆吉福德的牙齿印模

translation.en: See if they match.
translation.zh: 看看跟这咬痕吻不吻合

translation.en: You really want to do that?
I feel it's the right thing to do.
We don't want someone else to get killed because we didn't do our job, huh?
translation.zh:
我们也不想
再有人因为我们失职而被杀 对吧？

translation.en: I won't stop you.
[whispers] You sure you're not doing this to milk the overtime for that truck?
translation.zh:
你确定你这么做
不是为了挣加班费来买那辆皮卡吗？

translation.en: [automated voice] Front door open.
I'm in the kitchen.
Hi.
Will. Hey.
-Hi. -[woman] Nice to meet you.
I'm glad you both could make it.
What year is this place?
1968. Yeah.
Let me show you around.
That was the living area, and here's your dining room.
translation.zh: 刚才那里是客厅 这里是餐厅

translation.en: You could fit a table of ten to 12 easy.
translation.zh:
这里可以轻易放下
一张十到十二人的餐桌

translation.en: Can we see the bedroom?
Sure.
Up the stairs here.
Here's your master bedroom.
Got a his-and-hers closets and a full bath.
translation.zh: 有男女衣橱和全套卫浴设备

translation.en: -[woman] This is where it happened. -You…
-[man] Perfect. That's great. -[camera shutter clicks] -[woman moans] -[man] Yes.
translation.zh: 太完美了 真棒 太好了

translation.en: [man] Whoa, that's sexy.
-What the fuck are you doing? -[woman] Oh.
Hey, can she take a picture with you?
translation.zh: 嘿 她能跟你合个影吗？

translation.en: -Please? -Get out.
-It would be perfect-- -Get the fuck out!
translation.zh:
-那样就完美了
-你们他妈给我滚出去！

translation.en: Fuck.
[Tom] Now we know. We go from here.
translation.zh:
我们知道了
剩下的就交给我们吧 谢谢你

translation.en: Don't be scared, now.
It's inconclusive.
What did he say?
The bite is not deep enough.
Okay, so do you have any objections to us closing the case?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你反对我们结案吗？

translation.en: Nah.
Okay, Captain. See you in six months.
translation.zh: 好 警监 六个月后见

translation.en: [Judy] You tried, babe.
We tried.
It was here at this abandoned storefront on Hill Street
translation.zh: 就是在希尔街上的这个废弃店面这里

translation.en: that a scary car collision turned into something far more shocking.
translation.zh:
一场可怕的汽车相撞事故
演变成了一起更加令人震惊的案件

translation.en: The driver of this GMC Suburban collided with a Ford Explorer and was stuck inside.
translation.zh:
这辆GMC萨博班与一辆福特探险者
发生碰撞 GMC的司机被困在车内

translation.en: When police finally extracted the man from the vehicle,
translation.zh:
当警方最终把该名男子
从车里救出来时

translation.en: they found 13 kilos of heroin in the back seat.
translation.zh: 他们在车后座发现了13公斤海洛因

translation.en: Police believe the man was trafficking the drugs from the storefront and reversed…
translation.zh:
警方相信该名男子从这个店面里
拿到毒品上车后 看都没看…

translation.en: [reporter] …they found 13 kilos of heroin in the back seat.
translation.zh: …他们在车后座发现了13公斤海洛因

translation.en: Police believe the man was trafficking the drugs from the storefront
translation.zh:
警方相信该名男子
从这个店面里拿到毒品上车后

translation.en: and reversed without looking.
-Thankfully, none of the-- -[mutes TV audio]
Yeah.
[Tom] Looks like someone was locked inside
translation.zh: 看样子是有人被锁在了里面

translation.en: and went out the window with the chair, huh?
translation.zh: 然后用椅子打破窗户跑了 对吧？

translation.en: Any blood?
So is there anyone you can think of who might have done this?
translation.zh: 你们能想到这有可能是谁干的吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
How 'bout that Eli Phillips guy?
translation.zh: 那个叫伊莱菲利普斯的家伙呢？

translation.en: Look, I took a look around.
Aside from the broken window,
translation.zh: 除了那扇被打破的窗户

translation.en: my mom's computer's here,
I didn't see anything of importance that was missing.
translation.zh: 我没发现有什么重要的东西丢失

translation.en: [Cleary] Well, it is a big building.
Maybe have just one more look around. Take some time--
[Camille] I told you we need to get cameras.
translation.zh:
-等过一段时间…
-我跟你说过我们得装监控

translation.en: [Will] I know.
[man on TV] When police learned that Stephanie's hair was long
translation.zh: 当警方得知斯蒂芬妮的头发很长

translation.en: and in a ponytail the day before she died, they realized that her killer had…
translation.zh:
而且她在遇害前一天是扎着马尾辫时
他们意识到杀害她的凶手…

translation.en: Take your finger off the trigger.
translation.zh: 把你的手指从扳机上移开

translation.en: You okay?
He was creeping around.
Lower your gun.
You told me when I was ready to talk that I should reach out.
translation.zh:
你之前跟我说
等我准备好开口了就来找你的

translation.en: -Call the police. -I did.
[Tom] Give me your gun, babe.
Go get dressed.
Babe, come here.
-I'm proud of you. -[Judy murmurs]
I got something I want to show you.
Something that will prove the Gradys are fucking crooks.
translation.zh: 那可以证明格雷迪一家都他妈是骗子

translation.en: Did you know that Summer was being ripped off by a company called White Fish?
translation.zh:
你知不知道
萨默一直被一家叫白鱼的公司欺诈？

translation.en: No?
This is your chance to redeem yourself.
I don't have to be redeemed, you understand?
translation.zh: 我不需要赎什么罪 你明白吗？

translation.en: Do you know who Rudi Rakoczy is?
translation.zh:
-你知道鲁迪拉科奇是谁吗？
-我没听说过这个人

translation.en: He works for the Gradys. You're not listening to me!
translation.zh:
他是格雷迪家的马仔 -如果你不…你压根就没在听我说！
-这里

translation.en: [Tom] Back here!
translation.zh:
-如果你不…你压根就没在听我说！
-这里

translation.en: Rudi Rakoczy was picked up with… with 13 kilos of heroin.
translation.zh: 鲁迪拉科奇携带13公斤海洛因被抓到

translation.en: You're not fucking listening to me.
translation.zh: 你他妈压根就没在听我说

translation.en: The Gradys are just laundering drug money. For fuck's sake!
translation.zh:
格雷迪家在洗白他们贩毒赚来的钱啊
去你妈的！

translation.en: You know my father died with a gun in his mouth? From a farm that he built with his own fucking hands!
translation.zh:
我父亲他妈的
在他亲手建起来的农场里吞枪而死

translation.en: You're a bigger crook than them if you don't do something about it!
translation.zh:
如果你不做点什么
那你就是个比他们还大的骗子

translation.en: The Gradys are crooks!
The fuck did your Gemini twin want?
translation.zh:
你那双子座孪生兄弟
他妈的想干什么啊？

translation.en: -Fuck if I know. -[Cleary chuckles] -Maybe he wanted to go swimming. -[Cleary laughs]
translation.zh: 我他妈怎么知道？也许他想来游泳吧

translation.en: Thanks. Judy should've put a fucking bullet in his head.
translation.zh: 谢谢 朱蒂该他妈一枪打爆他的头的

translation.en: Instead, she put a bullet in the pool.
translation.zh: 结果她却一枪打爆了游泳池

translation.en: -[Cleary] I got it. -[pen scratching]
[under breath] No commissions. No commissions. What the fuck?
translation.zh: 无佣金 这他妈怎么回事？

translation.en: [Tom] Hi. Where can I find the drug-related civil asset forfeitures?
translation.zh:
你好 我在哪儿能找到
与毒品相关的公民财产没收档案？

translation.en: [man on phone] White Fish isn't active anymore. Do you have anything on it?
translation.zh:
-白鱼这家公司已经不存续了
-你有查到什么它的信息吗？

translation.en: All I got is an old PO box. That's it.
translation.zh:
只查到一个旧的邮寄地址
别的就查不到了

translation.en: Okay.
There's another company with that same PO Box.
translation.zh: 还有另一家公司也是这个邮寄地址

translation.en: What's it called?
A private security company. Active Duty Consulting.
translation.zh:
那是一家私人安保公司
叫现役警察安保咨询

translation.en: Okay, Jimmy.
I'll take it from here.
[Tom] Yeah, the bust from the other day, Rakoczy, can I see that?
translation.zh:
前几天查获的那些毒品
就是拉科奇那案子的 我能看看吗？

translation.en: [officer] Another one lost to the dark side.
translation.zh: 又一个弃明投暗的家伙

translation.en: What do you mean?
[officer] He's C.I., Rakoczy.
He was an informant for us for years and now he's got 15 years on his head.
translation.zh:
他给我们当了很多年线人
而现在他要面临15年的刑期

translation.en: [Tom] When was this booked into evidence?
translation.zh: 这些是什么时候被登记为证物的？

translation.en: September 21st at midnight.
Can I see the drugs from the Sam Gifford case?
translation.zh:
我能看看
山姆吉福德案查获的毒品吗？

translation.en: They were sent up for disposal.
When?
[officer] 8:30 a.m. on September 21st.
By who?
Wally Finn.
[Jimmy] Scarborough PD. This is Jimmy.
translation.zh: 这里是斯卡伯勒警察局 我是吉米

translation.en: [Tom] Hey Jimmy, I need a favor.
translation.zh: 嘿 吉米 我要你帮我个忙

translation.en: I need the phone records of a Rudi Rakoczy.
translation.zh:
我需要
一个叫鲁迪拉科奇的人的通话记录

translation.en: I need you to sign here.
-How am I supposed to do that? -[guard] Unhook him.
translation.zh:
-我这样子要怎么签？
-帮他解开手铐

translation.en: Who bailed me out?
[guard] LILC Bail Bonds.
L… LILC Bail Bonds?
-[pen scratching] -I had a knife. Um, can I have my knife back, please?
translation.zh: 我有一把刀子 请问能还给我吗？

translation.en: [guard] Change in there. When you come back, you get your knife.
translation.zh:
去那里换衣服
换完回来就能拿回你的刀子了

translation.en: [Judy] The next thing I knew, it just went off.
And the guy was on the floor. Turned out I hit the pool.
translation.zh:
那家伙趴到了地上
结果那枪我打中了游泳池

translation.en: -Oh my God. I'm glad you're okay. -Yeah, thank you.
translation.zh:
-噢 天啊 幸好你没事
-是啊 谢谢关心

translation.en: [Judy] How are you?
Good.
Where's everyone? I dunno.
But Deena said that they're gonna stay home for the night.
translation.zh: 但蒂娜说他们今晚要留在家里

translation.en: -Is Allen okay? -Yeah.
Is that Peter over there? Our contractor?
translation.zh: 那边那个是帮我们装修的彼得吗？

translation.en: Oh yeah.
What's he doing here?
-I might have told him about it. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我可能跟他说过我们会来这里吧
-好吧

translation.en: That was a lot more fun than I remembered. Haven't done that since I was a kid.
translation.zh:
这比我印象中有趣多了
长大之后 我就没跳过这种舞了

translation.en: -[Judy] Hey. -Hey. How are you?
I saw the owner of Zuzu's. Should I tell her about my bags?
translation.zh:
我刚才看见祖祖的老板了
我要不要去跟她说说我包包的事？

translation.en: Yeah, that's a good idea.
Go on. Yeah.
How's that, uh… that new kitchen treating you?
translation.zh: 你对你的新厨房还满意吗？

translation.en: You find her attractive?
Which one? [chuckles]
How far would you go?
Excuse me?
No, are you willing to die for it?
translation.zh: 你宁死也不愿意承认是吗？

translation.en: I… I don't know what we're talking about here, Tom.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么 汤姆

translation.en: You don't know what the fuck I'm talking about?
translation.zh: 你他妈不知道我在说什么？

translation.en: -[Peter] No. Absolutely no idea. -Holy shit. You're fucking cute.
translation.zh:
-我真不知道
-你大爷的 你真他妈滑头

translation.en: I'm warning you, man. Don't let me fucking catch you.
translation.zh: 小子 我警告你 别他妈让我逮到你们

translation.en: How'd it go? Done. Should we hit the floor?
translation.zh:
-聊得怎么样？
-聊完了 我们要不要去跳舞？

translation.en: Uh, I'm okay. Peter, want to go?
translation.zh: 我不太想去 彼得 你要去吗？

translation.en: No, I'm going to sit this one out.
No?
Okay.
You and me, babe. How 'bout it?
translation.zh: 那就我和你跳吧 宝贝 可以吗？

translation.en: [Judy] No. He was more scared than I was.
[Allen] Did he say why he was there?
translation.zh: 他有说他为什么到那里去吗？

translation.en: He said he knew Tom. And he tried to leave, so I fired a warning shot.
translation.zh:
他说他认识汤姆 然后他想逃走
于是我便开了一枪以示警告

translation.en: [Jimmy] Hey, Tom. Got the phone records you wanted.
translation.zh: 嘿 汤姆 我搞到你要的通话记录了

translation.en: You know, uh, the only weird thing I see is that this Rudi Rakoczy guy
translation.zh:
那个 我唯一觉得奇怪的是
这个叫鲁迪拉科奇的家伙

translation.en: called this 3586 number 17 times the day Summer Elswick was killed.
translation.zh:
在萨默埃尔西克遇害的当天
给这个尾号为3586的号码 打了17次电话

translation.en: Anyway, food for thought. Just found that interesting.
translation.zh:
反正这值得深思
我是觉得这挺耐人寻味的

translation.en: [Tom, under breath] 809-122-3586.
Hello?
[man] Hey, this is ADT Security calling about your upcoming camera install.
translation.zh: 您好 这里是ADT安保公司 想沟通一下上门安装监控的事

translation.en: [automated voice] I'm sorry, but the person you called has a voice mailbox that has not been set up yet.
translation.zh:
对不起 您呼叫的用户
尚未启用语音信箱服务

translation.en: [Will] I don't want any trouble.
I just want what you took from me.
translation.zh: 我只是想拿回被你拿走的东西

translation.en: [shakily] What I took… from you?
translation.zh: 我拿走了你的什么东西？

translation.en: Charming.
-I'll tell you what. -[drawer opens]
[Will] You give me back what you took from the office,
translation.zh: 你把你从办公室里拿走的东西还我

translation.en: and I won't press charges.
Wait a minute. Let me get this straight.
translation.zh: 等会儿 让我捋一下

translation.en: I give you what I took from your office,
translation.zh:
我把我从你的办公室里
拿走的东西还给你

translation.en: and you don't press charges?
-[Will] Very good. -Fuck you.
How's your mom doing?
She still kicking?
No, she's… she's dead, Will. You know that.
translation.zh: 不 她死了 威尔 这你知道的

translation.en: You two know each other, right?
What's the difference between me and you?
What do you mean?
What's the difference between me and you?
You talk a good one, but you don't do what you're supposed to do.
translation.zh:
你嘴上说得好听
可是你该做的事都没做

translation.en: And what's that?
You don't know that song?
No, I don't.
What about you?
-What's that? -[raps] ♪ You talk a good one ♪
translation.zh:
什么？ 你嘴上说得好听
可是你该做的事都没做

translation.en: ♪ But you don't do What you're supposed to do ♪
translation.zh:
你嘴上说得好听
可是你该做的事都没做

translation.en: Is that Wu-Tang?
Jesus Christ, this clown thinks it's Wu-Tang.
translation.zh:
天啊 这家伙居然以为
这是武当帮的歌

translation.en: It's Dr. Dre.
Hello?
Hello?
[Jimmy] Here's what I got. That 3586 phone number I flagged for you.
translation.zh:
我查到了 之前我跟你说的
那个尾号为3586的号码

translation.en: It belongs to a property trust.
translation.zh: 是一家房地产信托机构的

translation.en: No shit. What else you got?
translation.zh: 不是吧？你还查到了什么？

translation.en: All I see is that it's listed under W6.
translation.zh: 我只查到它被列在W6之下

translation.en: I talked to Deena, and they can get the stem cell in the Bahamas,
translation.zh:
我跟蒂娜聊过了 她说
他们能在巴哈马群岛弄到干细胞

translation.en: but it's expensive and their insurance won't cover it.
translation.zh:
但那要很多钱
而且这不在医保报销范围之内

translation.en: Well, they can afford it.
Right?
Is everything okay? Yeah, everything's okay.
-I think we're finished here. -Babe, you didn't even eat.
translation.zh:
-我看我们吃得差不多了
-宝贝 你一口都没吃呢

translation.en: I'm not hungry. We'll take this to go.
translation.zh: 我不饿 这些打包吧

translation.en: [waiter] Would you like any dessert?
-No. -We'll just have the check, please. Thank you.
translation.zh:
-不用了
-麻烦结账吧 谢谢

translation.en: Oh my God. Look who's here.
translation.zh: 噢 天啊 看看谁来了

translation.en: Who?
[Judy] Will Grady.
[Judy] Is that his girlfriend?
[Judy] That was fast.
Guess people grieve differently.
translation.zh: 看来人的悲伤程度各不相同

translation.en: So they're covering all the closing costs.
translation.zh: 这么说他们愿意支付所有的成交费用

translation.en: They were eager.
You should've heard this guy with the other broker.
translation.zh:
你该听听那人在电话里
是怎么跟另一个中介说的

translation.en: He was an animal. Didn't know you had it in you.
translation.zh:
他简直是个禽兽
他根本不知道你有这本事

translation.en: Well, I learned from the best.
-You got your card? -[Judy] Yeah.
-Okay, I'm gonna go say hello. -[Judy] Okay.
Thank you.
-[Judy] Everything okay? -Everything is fine.
Hey.
You're early.
-You found it good? -[Tom] Yeah, yeah.
Oh. It's the first time I've ever shown a house at gunpoint.
translation.zh:
我还是第一次
带身上有枪的人看房子呢

translation.en: -You're not afraid of guns, are you? -Not if they're in the right hands.
translation.zh:
-你不怕枪吧？
-只要拿枪的是好人我就不怕

translation.en: Oh good.
[Will] Come on in.
So this was a formal living room,
but I think it'd make a great study or an office.
translation.zh:
但我觉得改成书房
或者办公室也很不错

translation.en: And in here, you've got more of your family room.
translation.zh: 这里有更多的空间可以做家庭活动室

translation.en: Could put a TV up there, and there's great outdoor space as well.
translation.zh:
你可以在那里放台电视机
而且也有很棒的户外空间

translation.en: Through here, got your kitchen.
translation.zh: 穿过这里就来到了厨房

translation.en: Now, I think it looks a little dated,
translation.zh: 我知道这看起来有点过时

translation.en: but, uh, you know, you can replace these countertops with, uh, granite or some type of marble.
translation.zh:
但是 你可以把这些台面
换成花岗岩或者大理石的

translation.en: If your wife loves to cook, I mean, I think she'll love this.
translation.zh:
如果你老婆喜欢下厨的话
我想她会喜欢这里的

translation.en: This is my favorite room in the house.
translation.zh: 这是整栋房子我最喜欢的一个房间

translation.en: I mean, you could have a kids' playroom or, you know, a man cave.
translation.zh:
你可以把这里当成小孩的游戏室
或者属于男人的私密空间

translation.en: Wanna see the upstairs?
Let's start this way.
Right through to the master.
translation.zh: 穿过这里就来到了主卧

translation.en: This is a relic from the previous owner. [chuckles]
[Will] It's a street-facing view.
You know, it's a good room, but I'd rip out the carpets and start fresh.
translation.zh:
这房间是不错 但要是我的话
我会把地毯换掉 让这里焕然一新

translation.en: You gonna answer that?
Fuck.
Let 'em leave a message.
Piece of shit real estate agent.
[Judy] What?
What is it, babe?
[Tom] Nothing. Go back to sleep.
translation.zh: 没什么 你继续睡吧

translation.en: [Judy] Are you ready, babe?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗 宝贝？

translation.en: I'm ready.
-[Judy] Happy birthday. -There they are! There she is. Hey, beautiful. [kissing]
translation.zh:
-生日快乐 罗伯特叔叔
-他们来了 她来了 嘿 我漂亮的侄女

translation.en: -Hey, Tommy. -[Tom] Happy birthday.
Listen, I need to talk to you about something, just you and me.
translation.zh: 听着 我有些事要和你谈谈 就我和你

translation.en: -Perfect. Me too. -Okay?
translation.zh:
-好 我也想和你谈谈
-可以吗？

translation.en: -All right. -[Tom] Okay.
[Deena] Mahalo!
-Welcome. -Thank you.
-One for you. -[Judy] Mm-hm.
-[Tom] Hello. -Hello, hello. Mwah!
-[Deena] You made it? -[Judy] Yes. I was up till midnight.
translation.zh:
-这是你做的？
-是啊 我做到半夜才睡

translation.en: [all] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday, dear Allen ♪
translation.zh: 祝亲爱的艾伦生日快乐

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
Oh, come on!
What, are you gonna pretend that was the MS?
translation.zh:
怎么？你要假装
那是多发性硬化症吗？

translation.en: [Allen] Fuck you!
[Deena] Judy made this cake, everybody, and it is all vegan.
translation.zh:
各位 这个蛋糕是朱蒂做的
所用的材料都是纯素的

translation.en: [Allen] No animals were harmed making this cake.
translation.zh:
制作这个蛋糕
没有让任何动物受到伤害

translation.en: [Wally] Tom.
Why are you avoiding me?
I'm not avoiding you.
I've been here the whole fucking time. You haven't even said hello.
translation.zh:
我他妈在这里这么久了
你都还没跟我打过一声招呼

translation.en: Hello, Wally.
Come on. Give me a hug.
-I'll see you later, all right? -Okay.
[Allen] How you feeling?
[Tom] Good.
What'd you want to talk to me about?
You go first.
[Allen] Well, it's happening.
translation.zh: 跟你说吧 那事成了

translation.en: What's happening?
It's been confirmed. You're getting the medal.
translation.zh: 已经确认了 你要拿勋章了

translation.en: [Wally] Hey, you're up here?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们在这儿上面吗？

translation.en: [Allen] Come on up. We just got some great news. Perfect timing.
translation.zh:
上来吧 我们刚得知
一个好消息 你来得正好

translation.en: [Wally] What's up?
[Allen] Well, it's just been confirmed.
Tommy's getting the Medal of Valor. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 汤米要拿英勇勋章了 恭喜你啊

translation.en: [Wally] Good for you.
[Allen] It's the second-highest honor. Only one higher is the Medal of Honor.
translation.zh: 这是第二高的荣誉 仅次于荣誉勋章

translation.en: That one you got to die for.
translation.zh: 那个你得牺牲了才能获得

translation.en: I mean, come on, shall we have a drink?
translation.zh: 我说 我们是不是得喝一杯？

translation.en: This deserves a drink.
So?
What did you want to talk about?
This is a Chrysler Imperial.
translation.zh: 这是一辆克莱斯勒帝国

translation.en: [Allen] Yeah.
Just like the one at Whitcomb.
translation.zh: 跟出现在惠特科姆的那辆很像

translation.en: Yeah, I'm storing it for someone.
translation.zh: 没错 我帮人保管的

translation.en: [Tom] For who?
Tommy… [chuckles]
You and Judy have a good thing here.
Let it go.
Let's have a good time tonight.
[voice echoes] Oklahoma, you in or out?
translation.zh: 俄克拉荷马 你玩不玩？

translation.en: Are you in or you out?
He's in.
You weren't going to tell me?
What?
The medal comes with 20 grand.
translation.zh: 拿到那勋章能获得两万美元奖金呢

translation.en: [inhales sharply] What's taking them so long?
translation.zh: 他们怎么那么久还不过来？

translation.en: I'm stopping you because you didn't come to a complete stop at the stop sign.
translation.zh:
我拦下你是因为
你没在停车标志前完全停下来

translation.en: License and registration, please.
You need to be more careful. It's dark out there.
translation.zh: 你得更小心一点 这外面很黑

translation.en: -[Judy] Mm-hmm. -Yeah.
[policeman] I can see what's happening here.
Celebrating a little with your wife?
translation.zh: 你跟你老婆庆祝了一下

translation.en: How much further do you have to go to get your house?
translation.zh: 你们还要开多远才能到家？

translation.en: Three minutes.
[policeman] I'll need to follow you home.
translation.zh: 我得跟随你们到家为止

translation.en: Thank you.
By the way, congratulations on your medal.
translation.zh: 对了 恭喜你拿到勋章

translation.en: Much deserved, sir.
translation.zh: 那是你应得的 长官

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me what the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 你能告诉我这他妈是怎么回事吗？

translation.en: Why don't you ask your uncle what the fuck is going on?
translation.zh:
你为什么不去问你叔叔
这他妈是怎么回事？

translation.en: What are you talking about?
[Tom] White Fish is Wally and Will Grady.
translation.zh: 白鱼是沃利和威尔格雷迪开的公司

translation.en: Wally plants the dope, and the houses get seized.
translation.zh:
沃利在房子里放毒品栽赃
然后房子就被查封了

translation.en: Then White Fish buys them.
translation.zh: 白鱼再把那些房子买下来

translation.en: Summer was the broker.
translation.zh: 萨默是卖出那些房子的经纪人

translation.en: On paper, she made 70 grand, but she didn't see a penny.
translation.zh:
表面上她赚了七万美元
但实际上她一个子儿也没见着

translation.en: She didn't know anything about it.
[Judy] So they killed that girl over money?
translation.zh: 所以他们为了钱杀了那个女孩？

translation.en: [Tom] No. She was gonna talk.
translation.zh:
不 他们杀她
是因为她要把这事说出去

translation.en: You gotta tell Allen.
What are you telling me right now? He's in on it.
What?
He's either one of them or he's helping them.
translation.zh:
他要么参与了这一切
要么一直在帮他们

translation.en: What do you mean?
The Chrysler we've been looking for?
translation.zh: 记得我们要找的那辆克莱斯勒吗？

translation.en: It's sitting in his garage right now, as we speak.
translation.zh:
我们说话的这会儿
它就停在他家的车库里

translation.en: The Chrysler.
[Tom] Yeah.
I know.
It's crazy.
There's only one thing I love almost as much as I love you.
translation.zh:
我深爱你 这世上只有一样东西
能让我付出几乎同等的爱

translation.en: And that's being a cop.
[Tom] And you know what? This thing does not love me.
translation.zh: 可你猜怎么着？它并不爱我

translation.en: -[Tom] It's him. -[cell phone vibrating]
Does he know that you know?
translation.zh: 他知不知道你知道这一切了？

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm gonna need you to pack a bag. We're not sleeping here tonight.
translation.zh:
你去收拾一下
我们今晚不在这儿过夜

translation.en: -Hello. -[Allen] Hi, Tom.
You got a second?
[Tom] Yeah.
Listen, I want us to talk about the thing.
translation.zh: 听着 我想和你谈谈那件事

translation.en: There's an explanation. It… It's not what you think.
translation.zh: 我可以解释 事情不是你想的那样的

translation.en: [Tom] Okay.
What do you say to coming over to the house tomorrow morning so we can talk?
translation.zh:
你明天早上来我家
我们谈一谈怎么样？

translation.en: [Tom] What time? [Allen] Nine a.m.?
-Sounds good. -I'll see you tomorrow.
It's gonna be fine.
He's kept his mouth shut before. He'll do it again.
translation.zh: 他之前没有告密 这次也不会的

translation.en: [Marty] And you think Summer knew that our department was involved in all this shit?
translation.zh:
你认为萨默知道
我们警局的人参与了这一切？

translation.en: Yes, sir. I do.
I think that's why she called the FBI and not us.
translation.zh:
我认为正因如此
她打给了联邦调查局而不是我们

translation.en: When you asked Allen about the car,
translation.zh: 你问艾伦那辆车的事时

translation.en: what did he say?
He said he was keeping it for someone.
translation.zh: 他说那是他帮人保管的

translation.en: Did he say who?
Tom, I've known him for 40 years.
translation.zh: 汤姆 我认识他40年了

translation.en: This is crazy.
You tell anyone about this?
No, sir.
[Marty] Hi, Allen.
It's the two of us.
We just want to talk.
Come in.
[Allen] You want coffee?
[Marty] No, I'm okay.
Tom?
[Tom] I'm fine.
-Where's Deena? -[Allen] She is in church.
And you're here because of the car.
translation.zh: 你们来是为了那辆车的事吧

translation.en: Well, we… We're a little concerned, Allen.
translation.zh: 那个 我们有一点担忧 艾伦

translation.en: [Marty] We want to talk about a few other things too.
translation.zh: 我们还有些别的事情想谈

translation.en: Let's take it upstairs.
I gotta take a leak.
I'll meet you up there.
translation.zh: 我待会儿上楼去找你们

translation.en: You know where it is.
[under breath] Get out of here.
[whispers] You gave them the drive.
They know everything.
Go. Get out of here.
[Allen] He knows.
It's over.
[Marty] Tom.
It's me. Just put the gun down.
Sir, don't do it.
Tom, put it down.
No.
[Wally, hoarsely] Fuck.
[faintly] I can't feel my legs.
I can't feel my legs.
Oklahoma.
Hey.
Oklahoma.
Finish it.
[female dispatcher] 911, what's your emergency?
translation.zh: 这里是911 请问有什么事？

translation.en: -♪ Mama, take this badge off of me ♪ -[dispatcher] Hello?
Hello?
[dispatcher] 911, what is your emergency?
translation.zh: 这里是911 请问有什么事？
